00001 #include "Token.h"
00002 
00008 Token::Token(char ch) {
00009   if (isupper(ch)) ch = tolower(ch);
00010   if (isalpha(ch)) {
00011     tt = variable;
00012     tv = ch;
00013     return;
00014   }
00015   switch(ch) {
00016   case '*':
00017   case '&':
00018     tt = binary_op;
00019     tv = AND;
00020     break;
00021   case '+':
00022   case '|':
00023     tt = binary_op;
00024     tv = OR;
00025     break;
00026   case '-':
00027   case '~':
00028     tt = unary_op;
00029     tv = NOT;
00030     break;
00031   case '>':
00032     tt = binary_op;
00033     tv = IF_THEN;
00034     break;
00035   case '<':
00036     tt = binary_op;
00037     tv = THEN_IF;
00038     break;
00039   case '=':
00040     tt = binary_op;
00041     tv = IFF;
00042     break;
00043   case '0':
00044     tt = constant;
00045     tv = 0;
00046     break;
00047   case '1':
00048     tt = constant;
00049     tv = 1;
00050     break;
00051   default:
00052     tt = invalid;
00053     tv = NOP;
00054   }
00055 }
00056 
00057 ostream& operator<<(ostream& os, const Token& T) {
00058   switch(T.tt) {
00059   case variable:
00060     os << char(T.tv);
00061     break;
00062   case constant:
00063     os << T.tv;
00064     break;
00065   case unary_op:
00066     os << "-";  // only unary operation
00067     break;
00068   case binary_op:
00069     switch (T.tv) {
00070     case AND:
00071       os << "*";
00072       break;
00073     case OR:
00074       os << "+";
00075       break;
00076     case IF_THEN:
00077       os << ">";
00078       break;
00079     case THEN_IF:
00080       os << "<";
00081       break;
00082     case IFF:
00083       os << "=";
00084       break;
00085     }
00086     break;
00087   case invalid:
00088     os << "!";
00089     break;
00090   }
00091   return os;
00092 }
